recipe.title: Rum Punch Glencoe Harbor Club
ingredients: Orange slices for garnish if desired
Maraschino cherries for garnish if desired
instructions: In a pitcher combine the juices, the rums, the brandy, the grenadine syrup, the Triple Sec and the bitters and chill the punch, covered, until it is cold. Pour the punch into long-stemmed glasses filled with ice cubes and garnish each drink with an orange slice and a cherry.
